posts.post_content:
I'm a collector, recently retired and new to this forum.

Over the last couple of years, buying on ebay, I've accumulated a couple of dozen doubles of T205 and 206's.  They're mostly in poor to fairly good condition, with some either being short/trimmed and a few having back problems.  I'd be interested in trading them for T205-206's of roughly equal value that I need.

Do you do such trading, and if so, how so?

Doug Doremus/dougscats

Hi Doug!

we sure do. Any chance you have a t206 frank smith white cap?

There is a low-end T206 trade thread going around a week or two ago. Also people had interest in T205s

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=126625[/url]
